item.title: HTB Redcross local root (basic rop)
item.description: Warmup post about the alternative way of rooting the Redcross box. Target binary: iptctl: setuid, setgid ELF 64-bit LSB executable, x86-64, version 1 (SYSV), dynamically linked, not stripped > source was also available on the host: /var/jail/home/public/src/iptctl.c Ideally we could easily reach the vulnerable part of the code: if(argc==2){ if(strstr(argv[1],"-i")) interactive(inputAddress, inputAction, argv[0]); } else{ strcpy(inputAction, argv[1]); strcpy(inputAddress, argv[2]); } ..but let’s pick the other way. recon The interactive() function looks interesting:
